statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: — Darius Beane's 25 points helped Lindenwood defeat William & Mary 71-60 on Sunday at the Air Force Classic.
article.headline: Beane scores 25 as Lindenwood takes down William & Mary 71-60
article.linkText: Beane scores 25 as Lindenwood takes down William & Mary 71-60
article.story: COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo. -- — Darius Beane's 25 points helped Lindenwood defeat William & Mary 71-60 on Sunday at the Air Force Classic. Beane shot 10 of 19 from the field and 5 for 9 from the line for the Lions (3-3). Keith Haymon scored 15 points while going 5 of 9 (5 for 7 from 3-point range), and added seven rebounds. Keenon Cole shot 4 for 13 (2 for 6 from 3-point range) and 3 of 4 from the free throw line to finish with 13 points. Chase Lowe led the way for the Tribe (2-4) with 17 points, seven rebounds, four assists and two steals. William & Mary also got 16 points from Gabe Dorsey. Noah Collier also had 11 points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
